name: Stick Anime Fight Slayer Ninja
description:
Stick Anime Fight Slayer Ninja is an cool and offline action fighting game.This arcade game stunning 2D graphics, simple side-scrolling interface and easy-to-learn & cool controls.

- This Game has wide range of skills you can mix for devastating combos.

- Fight using a dynamic combat system and unleash devastating wrath attacks while freely navigating the battlefield using intuitive controller

- Enter into the arena and fight for the survival. If you love playing then this is the game which will amaze you with the swift handling and amazing features.

It is totally free. Let's enjoy!

-Stick Anime Fight Slayer Ninja was inspired by "Stick" promises to do the most exciting games in this genre.

FEATURES

- Easy and Simple to play
- Cool skill design and effect
- Smooth, easy, addictive & intuitive gameplay.
- Smooth fighting action.
- Different upgrade way.
